website_summaries.verdict: A handsome and luxurious smartwatch that resembles a traditional analog timepiece. Features LTE voice and data capability for calls and messaging away from your smartphone.
pros: Military spec design with IP68 water, dust, and extreme temperature resistance
Has built-in speaker and microphone for hands-free calling
cons: S voice personal assistant functionality is limited

website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's watch survives, for now, as one of the better options for Android phone users.
pros: GPS, speakerphone, optional stand-alone LTE phone service and work-anywhere Samsung Pay.
Spotify app streams music on the go.
Works with most Android phones, and even iPhones to a degree
cons: Tizen-based software has less app support than Apple Watch or Android Wear
iOS connection works, but it's very buggy
Few killer apps take advantage of stand-alone LTE services

customer_reviews.title: Crashed. No longer works.
customer_reviews.text: 4 months later and it crashed. Cannot seem to fix it. Now it looks like I own $300 of piece of metal. Otherwise I enjoyed while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: JayBee

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Runners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for two reasons, to track my runs and to be able to go running without my phone and still listen to music via the Spotify app. The watch is grossly inaccurate for distance. I have compared it to three other GPS watches and because it can never find my location it underestimates how far I have run. Similarly once I got Spotify connected to the watch (which was difficult to begin with) it wouldn't stop playing, so I can't use that feature either. I guess it kind of tracks calories and I do like the sleep analysis but honestly, if you're using this for fitness you're better off just getting a Garmin or Apple watch.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality but could use a few upgrades

I have to charge it every 2 days or less. it is great with water and I haven't had any problems, but the outside bezel gets scratched pretty easily. One other negative feature is that it sometimes won't wake when I motion, it will sometimes send through e-mails numerous times, and it freezes every so often. I hope in future generations they have higher processing speed because I think that will solve many problems.
